groupParamObject.description: Container for information about a CBSD membership group.

cbsdInfoObject.description: Container for optional information related to the CBSD hardware and software configuration.

___firmwareVersion.description: Name of the CBSD firmware version.

___hardwareVersion.description: Name of the CBSD hardware version.

___softwareVersion.description: Name of the CBSD software version.

$eref.description: Registration parameters provided for a CBSD

airInterfaceObject.description: Air interface parameter for a CBSD

___radioTechnology.description: Which PHY radio technology is used by the device in the 3.5GHz band

___supportedSpec.description: Description of the spec of the radio technology supported.

___groupingParam.description: List of group memberships of this CBSD.

___cbsdCategory.description: A if the device is Category A; B if it is Category B

___callSign.description: The call sign for the operator. Meaning and origin TBD

___userId.description: Unique user designator for the operator. Generation mechanism TBD

___fccId.description: The certification FCC ID for the hardware

___cbsdSerialNumber.description: Unique identifier for the CBSD chosen by the manufacturer

___measCapability.description: List of supported sensing capabilities of the device

___grants.description: Contains one or more GrantData object. Contains [all] active [and pending (for purposes of margin allocation)] grants of the CBSD.

___requestedOperationParam.description: Same as operationParam.If only this field is present (and not the operationParam field), there is no active grant associated with the request.

___operationParam.description: When present, includes operation parameters of the successfully requested grant.

___terminated.description: Indicates whether the grant is currently terminated or not.

___grantExpireTime.description: Indicates the UTC time when the grant expires.

___id.description: A grant identifier unique to this grant and CBSD allowing peer SASs to identify the grant.

Format cbsd/$CBSD_REFERENCE_ID where $CBSD_REFERENCE_ID is defined as UTF-8($FCC_ID + '/' + sha1($SERIAL_NUMBER)), the SHA-1 hash of the device manufacturer serial number that is unique within the FCC ID namespace scope
